definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 bian4 nuan3

definition: global warming (PRC usage)/written 全球暖化 in Taiwan

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球变暖影响，青藏高原气候呈现出暖干趋势。

sentences.english: And all of this, of course, ignores the benefits of limiting global warming.
sentences.chinese: 而所有这一切都忽略了遏制全球变暖所带来的好处。

sentences.english: On others, such as global warming, the two countries are at opposite ends of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 在全球变暖等其它问题上，两国更是处于对立的两级。

sentences.english: The implications for desertification and global warming are immense.
sentences.chinese: 沙漠化和全球变暖之间有着千丝万缕的联系。

sentences.english: If you believe that, the world will continue warming.
sentences.chinese: 如果你相信这一点，那么世界将继续变暖。

sentences.english: Global warming will likely increase the number of heat-----related illnesses and deaths.
sentences.chinese: 全球变暖可能会增加与热相关的疾病发生并造成死亡。

sentences.english: The warming of the Earth and the con- sequent climatic changes affect us all.
sentences.chinese: 地球变暖以及随之而来的气候变化影响着我们所有人。

sentences.english: Windy Trend Linked to Global Warming?
sentences.chinese: 多风的趋势与气候变暖有关吗？

sentences.english: It seems counterintuitive that climate change could be responsible for both withering droughts and devastating floods.
sentences.chinese: 如果说干旱和洪水都源于气候变暖，这有些违背直觉。

sentences.english: It also confirms the notion that planting more trees in tropical rainforests could help slow global warming worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 而在热带雨林种更多的树则会减缓全球变暖。

sentences.english: My fleas are freaking out about globe warming.
sentences.chinese: 我的跳蚤因全球变暖而反应异常。

sentences.english: Will Prize-Winning Novels Shift Attitudes on Global Warming?
sentences.chinese: 获奖小说会转变对全球变暖的态度吗？

sentences.english: The global-warming documentary "An Inconvenient Truth" ultimately won the prize.
sentences.chinese: 最终反映全球变暖的《难以忽视的真相》获奖。

sentences.english: The sulphur aerosols are actually preventing some warming from taking place currently.
sentences.chinese: 含硫气溶胶实际上一定程度防止了变暖。

sentences.english: I put some orangish tones to warming the image up.
sentences.chinese: 我提了一些淡橘色色调使画面变暖。

sentences.english: During the process of water cutter cutting, the materials will not be very hot, but may be warm.
sentences.chinese: 在水刀切割过程中，材料不会变的很热，但可能变暖。

definition: global warming (PRC usage)/written 全球暖化 in Taiwan

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 bian4 nuan3

definition: El Niño effect, equatorial climatic variation over the Pacific Ocean
pinyin: e4 er3 ni2 nuo4 xian4 xiang4

definition: to become cooler/to lower the temperature/cooling/(of interest, activity etc) to decline
El Niño, equatorial climate variation in the Pacific
cold air current/cold ocean current/cold stream
